# --- COMMON HARDENING START (DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY) ---
ARG CACHEBUST=1
RUN echo "Cache bust: $CACHEBUST" && \
    apk update && \
    apk upgrade --no-cache && \
    apk add --no-cache --upgrade \
        zlib \
        sqlite-libs \
        libcrypto3 \
        libssl3 \
        ca-certificates \
    && apk del --no-cache \
        wget \
        curl \
        nano \
        vim \
        git \
        netcat-openbsd \
        bind-tools \
    && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*
# --- COMMON HARDENING END ---
